text.div:
CARIN RTPBC Coupon Coverage Class Code System

This code system defines additional coverage class concepts related to medication discount coupons.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/us/carin/CodeSystem/rtpbc-coupon-coverage-class defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
coupon CouponDiscount coupon
coupon-request Coupon RequestKey that can be used to obtain a discount coupon.

name: CarinRtpbcCouponCoverageClassCodeSystem
title: CARIN RTPBC Coupon Coverage Class Code System
description: This code system defines additional coverage class concepts related to medication discount coupons.

concept.definition: Key that can be used to obtain a discount coupon.
